publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Hosea 14
ab.l: V́eŕań bolur Šoḿeron ki tandy T́eńrisińa qylyč ašyra t́uš́arĺar jaš ulanlary tašla- nyrlar da ḥamila qatynlary jarčyḥlanyrlar.
T́ešuva byla qajtḥyn ėj Jiśraʾeĺ H-ɣa T́eńrija ki uzej śuŕuńd́uj jazyḥlaryj ičińa.

Alyjyz birǵajiźǵa t́ešuva śoźĺariń da qajtyjyz H-ɣa ajtyjyz anar bar t́uśĺu jazyḥny bošatḥyn da qabul ėt́kiń jaḥšy qoltḥalarymyzny da t́oĺajik tanalary ornuna qarban- nyn galutta t́efilalar ėrińĺarimiź byla.
Mod́e bolajyḥ da ajtajyḥ ki ʾAšurda jarlyɣašlejalmast biźni at üśt́uńa atlanmazbyz da ajtmaz- byz artyḥ T́eńrimiź ičińa qollarymyznyn ki śeniń ḥajyfsunmaɣyjdan raḥḿet́- ĺańadir har ökśuź.
Onɣaltyrmyn t́erślikĺariń alarnyn śuv́armiń alarny ǯomart ǯan byla ki qajtty ačuvum andan.

Bolurmyn čyḥ
kibik Jiśraʾeĺǵa jašaryr giĺaflik kibik da uzaryr butaḥlary Ĺevanonnun ki- bik.
Uzaryrlar ińč́ḱa butaḥlary da bolur źejtunnun kibik syjy anyn da ijisi anyn Ĺevanonnun kibik.
Tynč bolurlar olturuvčular ḱoĺaǵasiń- d́a sav bolurlar b́urt́uk kibik da jaš aryrlar borlalyḥ kibik ijisi anyn vinasynyn kibik Ĺevanonnun.
ʾĖfrajim ajtyr ńe keŕak ėdi maja išan- ma abaḥlarɣa ḿeńd́a bolušurmyn anar da jaḥšy ḱoź byla baɣarmyn any ḿeń jaš b́eroš kibik bolurmyn anar ḿeńd́ań jemiši bolur tabuladoɣon.

Kim uslu da anlasyn bularny aqylly da biĺsiń alarny ki t́uźd́urĺar jollary H-nyn da rastlar baradyrlar anyn byla vaĺe tanuvčularɣa śuŕuń- č́akĺar ḱoŕuńadir alarɣa ol jollarda. מִי חָכָם וְיָבֵן אֵלֶה נָבוֹן וְיֵדָעֵם כִי יְשָרִים דַרְכֵי יְהוָ֗ה וְצַדִקִים יֵלְכוּ בָם וּפו֗שְעִים ⁖ יִכָשְלוּ בָם.

app.note: F305-90: spelled jašyryrlar; a scribal error.
